name: Hentai Girl Clicker
description:
This is Hentai Girl Clicker!!
Anime and HENTAI Girls...♡

Click & idling!
Gather the hearts of cute girls and see their naughty appearance!

Click on the cute Girl to activate "Fever Mode", boosting your clicking power!

Use the hearts you accumulate by clicking to upgrade your items! Grow to get more hearts!

Achievements make Click useful!
Try to get the achievement trophies!

You can enjoy the clicker with about 2 hours of gameplay.
